categories: Category:Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Conquest was a Secutor-class Star Destroyer in service of the Galactic Empire in 14 BBY. It was in use by Vice Admiral Dodd Rancit as a command ship while partaking in the blockade of the Carrion Spike above Carida.
The Conquest was created for Tarkin, a novel written by James Luceno and released in 2014.
